11532222.content:
A new form of magic had been discovered that allows two or more people to swap bodies as long as they agree to the swap. This new magic only switches bodies in a way similar to transformation magic, this means that after the swap all parties involved will still be wearing their bodies original clothes.

Example
If Natsu wanted to swap bodies with Erza they would have each others bodies but will be wearing the outfits they wore prior to the swap.

How long has this magic been publicly available?
11532222.title: How this new magic works

The Tale of Princess Kaguya? (かぐや姫の物語)
11533.title: Ranma 1/2

choices: Cologne, Happosai, and Shampoo rested unconscious, as the chaos settled.
Ranma felt dizzy, before collapsing across the carefully set table.
It was Kodachi and Tatewake Kuno, who were fighting.
Ranma felt a pain in his shoulder, where the blow... a pinch?... had landed.
115331.content:
Ranma was sitting around the low table. Akane sitting opposite him, with a scowl on her face. To his right, Nabiki was sitting trying to work out what had gone on between them, and how she could make a profit from it. Kasumi was the last to sit down, as she'd prepared the meal.

Taking on the role of replacing their mother. She was demure, respectful, and poured out a small cup of tea for each of her sisters, and the guest Ranma.

- - - - -

Genma, Ranma's father was absent, as was her own Soun Tendo. Some training, or more likely some hair-brained scheme had left the four of them alone in the house. Well, Ranma glared at Akane's pet pig resting in her lap. She was stroking the tiny P-chan, blissfully unaware that the pig was one of Ranma's rivals. However, Ranma was well aware that behind those piggy eyes, was a human intelligence. Ryoga HIbiki. A curse that he had to admit was partially his fault.

Sourly, Ranma thought of his own curse, and how that was his dumb father's fault. A chopstick snapped in his hand, and he looked apologetically to Kasumi. Instantly sorry for giving her any more work.

- - - - -

The sound of crashing, fists, and battle cries split the air. The only warning they had before the garden wall was vaulted. A ball of fury crashing down left a crater on the lawn. Narrowly missing the Koi pond. The battling melee ricochetting through the paper thin Shoji door.

There was a cacophony of cries, "Look Out..." mixing with "Die..." and "Suffer!". The roiling ball of fighters, still managed to land blows on each of the diners. Before Ranma shattered them apart with a single punch, sending them crashing, and falling unconscious against the sturdy wooden pillar supporting the roof.
115331.title: Ranma 1/2?

choices: Looking down, he saw his own body sprawled across the table.
A deep breath confirmed it, he was a she, and she was wearing a bra!
A harsh cry, a splash, and a feline yowl, announce Shampoo's arrival.
1153312.content:
Pain spasmed across Ranma's body, as he struck them. A rapid succession of finger sized blows, feeling his body freeze in place. There was an offended look on Nabiki's face, outrage that she'd been manhandled. The fire behind her eyes hid a fury that she'd make to offender sorry, and that they'd pay, and pay...

She was sitting sternly, disapproving of the mess, mentally calculating the cost of all the damage. Then it fell into place, she wasn't frozen in fury. She'd been hit with the same pinching strikes. She was incapable of movement. Alas, Ranma's body was already in violent motion, when he felt his fingers and toes tingle. They turned numb and immobile, as he crashed into the table.

He was unable to look away, as her eyes bore into him. His diving deep into the darkness of her fixed eyes too. He felt a flash of empathy, for the most mercantile of the sisters. Having to manage the household budget, ensure that Kasumi had enough money to buy the food, and that Akane was provided for.

He knew the burden of a negligent father, his own having cursed him with a degrading curse. One too shameful to be revealed, on pain of death. He wished he was a man fully, or even a woman, fully and completely, rather than this flip-flop state where he couldn't rely on anything or anyone.

Summoning reserves from deep within, he was able to close his eyelids and draw on his inner strength. Feeling the mental bonds, he flexed his muscles and they shattered into the black void. Instantly, he felt freedom return to his limbs. Blinking rapidly confirmed he was back in control.
1153312.title: Ranma felt dizzy, before collapsing across the ...

choices: Ranma came back to himself, instantly knowing something was wrong.
As Ranma woke, she knew instantly, she was a girl once again!
As he collapsed into unconsciousness, the sound of distant voices reached him.
1153314.content:
Feeling his muscles lock up, Ranma struggled to face the roiling ball of fighters. Recognising the mystic touch, couldn't free him from the effects, as he collapsed across the low table. Scattering the kettle, glasses and food in every direction. He was unable to even turn his head, as Kasumi's face came into view.

A sense of shame, at spoiling her hard work washed over him. A second wave of guilt followed, at failing to defend her, was intensified, as he spotted the blankness behind her eyes. She too, was clearly immobile. Stuck, sitting primly in place.

Ranma heard more than felt his body crash against the crockery and cutlery, as he was helpless to stop falling into her glazed eyes. It was only the fluttering of the table cloth that broke their locked gaze. Helpless to even bat the lightly flapping material aside, Ranma's vision was erased with a black, blank void.
1153314.title: Ranma felt a pinch in his shoulder...

choices: Ranma reached for Kasumi to silence her and keep the change a secret.
"Kasumi?" Kasumi asked blearily, slurring even her own name.
Even now, Ranma's thoughts still felt muddled and sluggish...
11533142.content:
It was with a groan, that Ranma struggled back to wakefulness. Feeling the weight of his chest, he knew once more that he was a she. Something cold must've splashed him as he fell across the table.

Even as she processed that, she knew something else was wrong. She could feel the lacy frills of the bra cups holding her bust in place. Ranma made it a point never to choose to wear 'girly' clothes, and these felt very feminine. The extra width and heft to her hips was no surprise, but she felt the chill touch of satin, rather than his usual plain cotton briefs.

Eyes snapping wide, she was rocked by another shock. As she looked down over her own body... No! His own body slumped over the table. He was moaning, and mumbling softly. She took in her clothes and realised to her shock, that she was in Kasumi's body. Wearing, her apron, and looking down at his former body.

The moan turned into a groan, as her old body turned his head, and looked back at her. From the confusion, it was clearly Kasumi, and she was just as startled and afraid as Ranma himself. There was more than a twinge of jealousy, from both as they looked at their opposite number.
11533142.title: As Ranma woke, she knew instantly, he was a she!

choices: Kasumi is distracted and distressed to find herself male!?!
Ranma finds herself growing used to the role of carer, and home-maker...
From the fighters, Happosai was chuckling his filthy laugh of delight.
115331421.content:
Already afraid, his mother discovering his curse. As Kasumi, Ranma was petrified of being discovered in her new body. He made to rush Kasumi from the room, before she could blurt out the truth of this degrading swap.

Taking his arm, she lifted him from the table. Moments later, only to find herself pinned there instead. She realised with shock, that their skills had been swapped along with their bodies. She squirmed and yelped, but was helpless to break free. The burst of speed, energy and fighting prowess surprising Ranma entirely.

"Let Kasumi Go!" the voice was crystal clear, and loaded with icy fury.

Ranma felt Kasumi's grip ease, and she was able to straighten up. Brushing the detritus of food from her clothes. There was more confusion on her former face. Apparently, Kasumi was still struggling to comprehend the change.

Putting on her best impression of Kasumi's mild-manners, and behaviour. She dismissed 'Ranma's misbehaviour, and guided the confused Kasumi to freshen up. His mind was still reeling, and he need to talk privately with her.
115331421.title: Ranma reached for Kasumi to silence her and kee...

choices: She was startled to return and see Akane and Ranma hugging.
The other household cleaning duties kept her busy for the rest of the night.
Ranma found it comforting and familiar to slip into Kasumi's routine.
She apologised, as she walked into the Dojo, disturbing a bout.
1153314212.content:
Not in a rush to reveal her switching, Ranma allowed her anger to dissipate in the warm soapy water of the sink. As Kasumi in her former body went back to apologise for the incident.

It was natural to wash the dishes, and put them aside to dry, as she distractedly listened to the conversation from the living room. It was odd to hear it from the outside. They all seemed to be ganging up on Kasumi, as if the whole incident hadn't been started by him. It was fighters crashing into the house that caused everything to unfold.

She was startled to find her hands on her hips. As she berated her sisters, and chided her father for talking to Ranma that way. She blushed as she came back to herself, the anger unfamiliar in her new body. She gave a demure bow, and disappeared back to the kitchen not wanting to further endanger her disguise.

Still flushed, she dried and put all the dishes away. Rinsing the sink clean to finish up, she felt an odd sense of joy, the simple pleasure of not transforming with either hot or cold water. She'd certainly had enough humiliating experiences, with unwanted changes.
1153314212.title: Ranma finds herself growing used to the role of...

choices: Ranma worries about where her housekeeping knowledge comes from...
Ranma, and Kasumi meet later that night for a quiet, private chat...
Nabiki starts to suspect, and makes threats for money...
11533142123.content:
As the rest of the family sat in the main room, Ranma knew what to do next. The dress was unfamiliar, and made most of the jobs a little trickier. But, dried and tidied away the dishes, enjoying the swishing sound she made whenever she walked even the shortest of journeys. Each a reminder that she was safe from unwanted changes.

The apron, was girly but practical. Ranma hummed to herself, as she tidied the kitchen. The broom was easy to find, and she set to work brushing the leaves from the veranda, humming a pleasant song to herself.

It was amusing for her to see Akane, and 'Ranma' still bickering. A soft giggle quickly stifled, as she watched her stubborn girlfriend causing another stupid argument with her boyfriend. She shook her head, as she heard the sound of a cry, followed by a splash.

The cry rising in pitch as it protested, that she was still right.

Ranma smiled, enjoying how well Kasumi was playing her new role too. She hoped it was as much fun for her, as she was finding in this new routine. Looking back along the freshly swept veranda, she could see what she'd achieved. Take pride in her efforts. There weren't any mad suitors racing to fight her, challenge her, or demand her hand in marriage.

She looked at her hand, bare of any wedding rings, and felt a little sad.
11533142123.title: Ranma found it comforting and familiar to slip ...

choices: Ranma stayed in the kitchen, and cleaned it up....
Kasumi returned, taking Ranma's former place at the table.
Akane arrived to ensure her fiancée wasn't bother her sister!
115331423.content:
Unfamiliar with her current body, Ranma's hand crashed across the tabletop. She snatched her hand back, as it was bathed in pain. She'd knocked the simmering kettle over, and splashed her hand in very warm water.

Gaping in shock, she stared at it. The slender hand, and delicate fingers, capped with a soft pink nail polish. It was hypnotic, he was so used to being restored with hot water that he was fascinated by the feminine hand.

The frozen expression was shattered, as her wrist was grabbed, and she was pulled into the kitchen.

"Best wash off, the water before it scars your hand."

Docilely, she followed, still dazed. But, she obeyed, listening to her former body. The chiding tone of her former body guiding her into action.

Her hands were thrust into the warm soapy water in the kitchen sink. The burning heat disssipating, from the injury. She allowed her former hands to rub back and forth, as if being taught how to wash her hands like a child.

Suddenly, the oddness snapped her back to reality. Her hands froze, slipping out of Kasumi's slippery grip. Ranma mentally reviewed her situation. She was stuck, as a woman. Without any hope of restoration, or much of an idea how she'd been swapped.

Again, the soft caresses of her lingerie stole her thoughts back to what she was wearing. Her apron, marking her as the home-maker. The underwear defining her as womanly. Blushing, Ranma realised that Kasumi was more of a success that she was as a man. Kasumi was a womanly woman, while he'd resolutely failed to be a man among men.

"Sorry..." She whispered to Kasumi, who she finally realised was deeply uncomfortable in his body. Standing just wrongly, the discomfort clear from her stance.

Retreiving her soapy hands from the water, she guided Kasumi's running them under the cold tap. In moments, Kasumi beamed a grateful smile back. No longer troubled by that disturbing piece of male flesh, she was back on more familiar terrain. Her hands running over her clothes, smoothing out wrinkles, real and imaginary. Ranma caught the slight, but definite squeeze, as she confirmed she once more had a bust, waist and hips. She even blushed slightly, realising her bust was fuller now. Ranma-chan though younger was more developed, and blessed with wider hips, and a more padded rear.

Allowing her time to adjust, she turned her attention to the dishes, washing them, and setting them aside to drain dry. It was satisfying work, and she found herself humming happily along. A shy kiss on her cheek from her former body made her blush too.

The thought struck him, perhaps something could be learned from this. That if he studied life as Kasumi, as a woman among her kind, that she might become a better man among men on her restoration.
115331423.title: Even now, Ranma's thoughts still felt muddled.

info.brief_description: Characters from various types of media swap bodies
info.description:
This story is about our main character swapping bodies with other people because of various conditions.
Multiple main characters will be available and will be described in the character selection, feel free to suggest any additional characters.
Side characters can be added as you wish as long as their inclusion fits the character and story, some side characters (like girlfriends or family members) could be predetermined within descriptions as well.

Have fun with the story without many limitations, just the usual stuff like no unnecessary deaths or gore, keep it fun for everyone (above 18 at least).
Make sure you keep the swaps descriptive and interesting, sex is fine, but don't overuse it as it is not the main focus of the story.
As well as this, try to make sure the chapters stay interesting and different, chapter which contradict previous chapters may be deleted if it creates too much confusion.

Try to write decently sized chapters, after the first few branches do not create chapters containing only a few sentences , these will be deleted if they get out of hand.
The style of writing will be in third person, please keep this theme throughout the story.
